for one thing.translation[0].definitions: used to introduce a reason for what you have just said
He couldn’t bring himself to say what he thought. For one thing, she seldom stopped to listen. For another, he doubted that he could make himself clear.
for one thing.translation[1].definitions: used to give one reason for something
Well, for one thing, it’s too big.
He’s not that wonderful. He’s bad-tempered for one thing.
